Reviews: Comida típica con un muy buen sabor, sin duda volvería mil veces más.... la arepa de chocolo es la locura
So much fun!! The music was amazing ! Food and drinks were great . Very unique with a good vibe, I would definitely recommend this to be on your to do list in Bogotá!
There are not words to accurately describe this place but it’s an experience that you can’t miss! The food was amazing as was the service and the entertainment.
Fun atmosphere, small plates, good for trying lots of different dishes, interesting drinks, friendly staff.
Andres Carnes de Res is a very famous restaurant with music and dancing floor. Great food, great attention, amazing party! Be aware, it is located 45 minutes away from Parque de la 93.

Titulo: Fabulous meal in this fun place
Reviews: We had a lovely evening in this restaurant - a great fun atmosphere and very good food. Would definitely recommend this and go back for a fun evening out.
Noisy restaurant informal ambience iconic place in Bogota . Meats exelent . Cocktails very diverse and original No wine list. A must to complete Columbia experience
An amazing restaurant where you can experience Colombian food. Fantastic ambiance and, for me , the highlight is decoration! You must visit if you visit Bogota!
It is a 5 floors restaurant with really great typical Colombian food! The staff is young and efficient! Definitely a place to go back!
Good food and great atmosphere. All of the staff also spoke English and the menu had translations when we were there which was a nice bonus.
Very fun and safe area to explore. We had our server just bring us her favorite dishes and it was a wonderful meal!
Stopped here first night for a great meal, great place to visit abc great food to share. Very lively with lots of celebrations.
Very nice restaurant with different floors. It is very interesting. Food is good and so is the service.
We had steak, and it was delicious. The chocolate cake was supreme. The ambience incredable. The music superrr. We had an awesome time. You have to go if you go to Bogota.
We visited the one in Chia, some 45 minutes away from Bogota but it was worthy. The food was very good as well as the ambience. A must visit place while in the area. Natalia was our superb waitress.

Titulo: Excellent Service, Food and Drinks, and Very Inexpensive
Reviews: My wife and I spent an evening drinking, dinning and dancing at the Infierno level. At the end of the night the bill was the equivalent of about $75.00. The facilities were clean, and security is paramount for them. They made us feel at home.
The environment is amazing. Excellent food, rather slow service. This place is a must,an excellent experience

Titulo: We love Andres Carne De Res!
Reviews: We love Andres Carne De Res! Entertainment, food, drinks all wrapped into one experience. Prices are fair and the food is delicious!
Dime of the food is great, some just ok, service could be better as is super slow, but overall a place you have to go to when in Bogota

It's fine - kinda like a TGI Fridays or Jack Astors. Food is really nothing special. Interesting to sit for a drink. I would skip this and go to the location in Chia which I found way more fun and less formulaic.
2nd time eating here. Good service very nice atmosphere and cozy decorations. All in a good experience
Awesome place with a truly unique atmosphere. Probably the biggest restaurant I’ve ever been to, excellent food and service. Pretty noisy but in a good way!
I had the opportunity to visit the restaurant which had a combination of vibrant and youthfulness in the ambience. Food was great.

Horrible the elevator was not working, someone with limited mobility has to be standing up for whatever time they want without calling to get the problem solved, would not recommend and would not come back!
Well, good food, amazing atmosphere and great decoration. The service could be better and the items are over price.

the place, service and food is outstanding. the decoration, the service is fast and well organized even though that has an extensive menu, The waitress camila recommend us fantastic dishes. I will return for sure.

Titulo: The must do plan in Bogota
Reviews: Great food, meats it's the speciality here, the menu is ample and diverse, at nights there's shows, the service some times is in custom and character, it can be a unique experience every time you go, never disappoints
Everything is about the experience. I went with my two daughters for a birthday celebration. They spend a lovely afternoon with all the activities. Highly recommended.

These place is great, live music, the service is very helpful and attentive. Special drinks superb. Food was great. Good place to have fun in group, if you want to have a quite dinner this is not the place.

Titulo: Great place to eat, the food is awesome!!!
Reviews: The place is really awesome!! the food is great, you must try Lmo al trapo" my God this is good!! Service is great. live music.

Titulo: A must when you visit Bogotá
Reviews: The place is amazingly decorated. There’s always something interesting to look at. The food is delicious; and the evening party a blast.

Went to Andres for dinner our last night in town which came highly recommended. The atmosphere is very cool but the food was mediocre at best. Pricey and service was very slow. Not a must eat at place.
This restaurant is huge and amazing it is like eating inside a modern art museum. There are 6 different floors. The best part is that the food was amazing as well!

Titulo: Awesome time! Great food! Excellent service
Reviews: We tried mollejas, chorizo argentino, arepaeguebo and also we ordered the Lomo al Trapo, everything was great!!
This is my favorite restaurant in Bogota, best service, best ambiance, best quality of food, best tasting food, best of everything! Totally recommended.

Titulo: An Amazing private ride with Mauricio to Andres Carne de Res Chia.
Reviews: We had a fabulous time, Mauricio wait for us and take us back to our hotel, will highly recommend Mauricio very professional and always on time.
Great place to eat, is a place that is mandatory to visit when coming to bogota. The service and food are good. Book before you go is recommendable.

Titulo: Good place to wait your flight
Reviews: Good Colombian food and mixed or influenced with other countries. The price are fair, considering that we are at the airport. I suggest to choose the "arepa de chocolo" as appetizer.
Great food and great location. There are so many things to see. The menu is like a book so many drawings etc. we were there to habe lunch. Food was very typically and very good

This restaurant is highly recommend by lonely planet and 5 star hotels but the food was bad and the service confused ( BUT EVERYBODY WAS KIND AND WELCOMING), I recommed it as a drinking and dancing spot
I was amazed, the place is great the food is amazing and you can go to all floors and have different experiences
A total experience. Everything was designed for maximum delight. Even the glass of wine isn't done ordinarily. A must try.

Titulo: Good food, Excellent service and a lot fun
Reviews: It was a really good experience, the people out there was really nice to deal with and the place it just amazing!
Great spot for big groups and celebrations. Okay drinks, very expensive. Great spot to salsa dance and meet others

The restaurant is very nice, ideal place for spending an evening with friends or in couple. Food is good, especially the meat. People working there are kind and fast. The live music makes everything looking better.
One of those places you need to visit while in Bogotá although you are much better off visiting the one in Chia

Titulo: Took the boss and some colleagues
Reviews: Well how can you not have a blast at this place? If you don’t you are dead as a rock. Must go it’s a blast and the other one outside the city is great at night!

Great food - both Colombian specialties or just top quality barbecue. The whole facility is decorated with reused materials - gotta see to believe what they did. Great soundtrack and friendly service.
Food was great! They gave the visitors welcoming sashes and a presentation with a little mariach music... Very nice. Huge drinks.
What a great experience. The restaurant is unbelievable, beautiful with friendly staff. This is Absolutely a must do when in Bogota!

Titulo: Must be there and be seen
Reviews: The famous and best restaurant in Bogota .Great menu and food ,perfect friendly service , incredible decoration helped to us for the amazing super dinner.

Overall this place has good food. Service was a bit slow but the food was on point. I think this is one of the flag ship restaurants you visit while in Bogota. Will return during my next trip to Bogota.

Titulo: Rumba n booger’s n tooth pickers oh my!
Reviews: Great atmosphere fun surroundings, great drinks, food was massive n ok. But the wait staff picking noses n teeth right at the bar while hanging around was pretty gross. Won’t be back!
Funky place with excelent meat choices. A wide selection of food and good service. The place is very eclectic with the decor.

Titulo: Great food (mostly for meat-eaters) and such a unique and fun ambiance
Reviews: Had a great work dinner here. The menu is daunting with so many choices but nearly everything we had was delicious. The dancing and special guests throughout the night kept the night lively.

- far away from Bogota, only by car; need a reservation 12000 pesos entrance fee expensive + design inside delicious food big portions big glasses for cocktails cool atmosphere with lots of small things
OMG so much meat, for 2 people, The food was unbelievable, The place was so entertaining, You need to stop by and enjoy the food.

Totally unique and wonderful place to dine.The ambiance is beyond description and needs to be experienced. The wait staff is excellent, the food tremendous, and we were serenaded as visitors. A late lunch turned into an event with many memories.
Loved the food and atmosphere the menu is so extensive and artistic Staff are very friendly Dishes are big and enough for 2 even 3 people
I went to have something quickly and was a great idea! I had a paella in the central bar! And it was perfect! Julian serves us and he was very kind and friendly
Food, drinks, and excellent music. You can’t miss this place, it’s unique. Go as early as you can order to have a good table and the EnJoy!
This is a must in Bogota! It is aplace truly for EVERYONE! Is outside of the city limits but is worth the trip. Good for lunch and dinner or partying!
Famous restaurant chain and it was a good meal with not too long a wait. Got business receipt without any problems. Good location so will return again.

This restaurant was recommended to us by many locals and it did not disappoint. The food was delicious and staff (everyone in Bogota really) were extremely friendly and helpful. Put this restaurant on your list. It is a must!

You have to come to Andre's Carne Res. The food is superb. They have decorations ALL over the place. It is like eating in a Museum or the Party Place. I highly recommend this place. You will NOT regret it.
Traditional Colombian food, in a well decorated place where each floor takes you from heaven to hell. There's good music, food and dancing.

Titulo: the best place to combine dinner and party if you are taking costumers or a business group
Reviews: One of the most fun paces in Bogota, with music, drinks and incredible environment. As a travel executive you cannot visit Bogota without going to Andres Carne de Res, its a classic.
Absolutely amazing place. Delicious food and great music and live music.. I love Andrés everywhere in Colombia. Try it 😉
This is the place to go for BBQ! It is inexpensive and has excellent food. We received a sample platter that introduced us to a few new things including capybara and some sort of corn patty.

Titulo: One of the best eating experience ever.
Reviews: The food , atmosphere and service are wonderful. The atmosphere is like a Cracker barrel but on steriods.
Good food, drinks, dancing and entertainment. A unique experience in the world!!! A massive restaurant with themed floors, taking you from the base floor themed as hell to the top which is heaven.
Got there by accident with friends! Excellent atmosphere and great drinks, although we didn’t eat, food looked delicious!
Second time in This restaurant , and it’s as good as the first time.No miss. Must visit. The food was awsome.We had the stake De Res and was the best.

Titulo: Great food, great atmosphere, great service!!
Reviews: This place is amazing! You could probably visit a thousand times and never be able to see all the cool stuff in there. The food, service and ambiance was awesome! Had a great time and loved it all! Can’t wait to go back!
The reastaurant us a mix of an excelent meat restaurant and discoteque what it makes a unique place. Highly recommendable to eenjoy a beatiful night in the great city of Bogota.

This place is unique. If you visit Bogota you must go there to have this interesting experience. The decoration is a show apart. The food is really good (but a little expensive) and they go from table to table doing some performances. Good service!

Titulo: Excellent service, great for large groups too!
Reviews: We had a group reservation for 20 and the service was just perfect. Lorena Grajales our events manager handled everything simply perfect. I recommend strongly this place for your large events.
What an enjoyable experience from start to finish. Fun outside the restaurant and inside. Food was just beautiful. I recommend the steak from a huge menu of choices...

Large , four storied bar & restaurant, interior decorated interestingly but very nice with a local Columbian flavor. Exciting, vibrant place, great music. Food, local Columbian cuisine: just delicious! Yes, a must to visit when in Bogota!

We visited because all people told us that Andres is the place to be, when you are in Bogota. The place is huge and the decoration is excellent. The service was good, but the food was less than average.

Amazing place with a fantastic heaven and earth theme spread over 4 floors. The meat is so tender and tasty. Best Lemonata de Coco in the whole of Colombia. We went there for Xmas day lunch, such a great athmosphe and entertainment. Highly recommended

This restaurant was exactly what we expected. Very touristy, nicely decorated, great music (although band was great but the singer was not) service and food well below average. Worth the visit but maybe just for drinks and dancing.
I swear I couldn’t close my mouth when entered this place. OMG! Food delicious, amazing music, staff soooo kind! For us, a magical experience. Totally worth it! 🥰🥰🥰😍😍😍

This place is a landmark - ok, maybe not this one (the one in Chia is the landmark), but a damn fine place regardless. Great steaks, better drinks and the best atmosphere. Make a reservation though - it's probably busy.
I am sorry.. I think this restaurant has more publicity than quality. The food is ok.. nothing special. You should get more value for money here in Colombia

Despite having four empty restaurant floors, they were not attentive in giving us a good table, and simply did not care that we left. I went because everyone talks about that place, I do not recommend it!
The place is decorated uniquely.... but the food is average. I feel that it is overrated... but I'm still glad that I tried it.
The restaurant has a huge menu and if you aren’t familiar with Colombian cuisine it’s a nightmare to choose a dish. The flavour is regular and the service it’s deficient.

Food was excellent and the ambiance its more than exiting! We were a group of 21 and everyone had the best time. After the meal the best part, music was WOW!!!! and we dance all night. Great Party every night!!!!!
The all ambient of the place is spectacular, live music, great service good food definitely must visit spot in Bogota

Titulo: A Kitsch restaurant with local and international cuisine
Reviews: This is a must if visiting Bogotá for some days. This iconic restaurant has become an international reference of a great place to dine and party.

The details of this place makes it so unique, the music is amazing you’ll never want to stop dancing and people are so kind and cheerful all the time. Food and drinks are sort of expensive but it’s totally worth it.
You will always remember the music and food and, perhaps most of all, the atmosphere- had a great time with friends!

Titulo: Legendary food-dance fusion – a sensation for all senses
Reviews: Casually organized chaos on five floors – loud, passionate, vivid, loving – the unfiltered colombian chaos of feelings and sensations and by coincidence they also serve the best steak in town.

Titulo: Great place for a Sunday afternoon
Reviews: Even if Andres DC is known as a top party spot in Bogota, during weekends' mornings and afternoons, there are a lot of things to do for your kids. Puppets, live painting, handcrafts will distract your children while you're enjoying your lunch!

Titulo: Don’t be fooled by the name
Reviews: This place is just a famous name but the food and specially the customer service are very poor think twice about going to this place you are going to ended up with a bad feeling about wasting your time and energy
Very welcoming, cute staff and good COCKtails. Just avoid the food. Too much deep fried. Hence not 5 stars. But go for drinks and people watching.

Titulo: A must place in Bogota! I n a mood to have fun and taste Colombian food and Drinks? Go now!
Reviews: The atmosphere is fabulous! It is a unique place to eat, drink, dance and have fun! Great way to know the Colombian way to enjoy life! Try the Papitas Criollas with guacamole, arepas, and tostadas de plátano!!!!!!
The food was great. The experience was great as each floor had a different theme and many nice things to see. I would definitely return the next time that I visit Bogota.
You have plenty of options and a huge variety of Colombian food. Plus a nice environment... On my last visit we went there 2 times because we loved the food and the place.
This is the place were most Bogota cherish their weekend. Music all over the place and parillada and dancing.
I loved the decoration it’s really nice inside! There’s a huge menu it’s literally a book!!! Food was great! We had a great night!

Titulo: A lot of fun while enjoying real good food
Reviews: This place is a most visit while in Bogota. The service is very good and offer very good live music. Food is amazing if you are interested in meat. Only drawback is a bit loud and hard to carry out conversations

We stopped here for a hot lunch prior to hitting the Sal Cathedral. It was so delicious. The food was fresh hot well cooked and seasoned to perfection. It's a must try. We had an authentic colombian lunch!
Excellent variety of food, amazing service. Beautiful Place. Prices a bit high. Good to eat any time of the day. Amazing Coffee.
Even though the space is huge (can fit 2000 people), the service was great. Excellent food and great sangria.
Unique in the world Great music good food No place similar in the world at night great for party during the day good food typical Colombian and bbq Don’t miss it
Great place to meet a group of friends to share food, drinks, and have a good time dancing! Prices are reasonable, and a good vibe over all.
We went for a drink and appetizers. Was perfect with beer and empanadas. Not to crowed and relax moment. A place to go for sure !
I have been twice, they were great dinners, live music, delicious dishes. My choice was steak. This restaurant is the only dinner choice for me in Bogota
If you like a nice place in the commercial area where to have great food and service is the place to go :)
Yes beef in Latin America is good. Here too, although not competitive with Argentina and Uruguay. A little noisy and you have to like the surfing Colombian high classes.
Loved the atmosphere here. Wild, fun, and a must see in Bogota. I went with a large group and it was louder and more fun as the night went on. Only thing was the food is good but not spectacular.

this place is expensive and has very bad food. it is a real disneylandia... if you like this kind of setting okey if not... don't go.. Tipp: if you go you should make a reservation because it's very popular...
Very fun vibe, great empanadas! People dancing everywhere, waiters were lovely. A little hard to get a seat but with so many floors, you eventually find somewhere to setup!

Best restaurant I visited in Bogota!!! Lively atmosphere, music, great staff!!! Cocktails are very good and the food is delicious!! Reservations recommended as it gets very crowded especially during weekends!

Went with family on a Friday night. Lots of great music and fun ambience. Menu is extensive, so it took a while to decide what we wanted to order. Food was delicious and I would recommend any appetizer.

Titulo: Excellent place to combine dinner & party
Reviews: Very nice atmospehre taht combines art, music, tradition etc. Delicious food and a wide variety of liquor, so there is a very enjolable party
Love the steak, love the drinks. Service could be better. Super funky place. Very "kitch". The store is highly overpriced. Music for dancing!
Food was average. Nothing to brag about. The service was incredibly slow. 30 minutes for a drink from the bar.
Very special restaurant. Enjoyable and different. I liked steak. Far away from Bogota, but it is a ‘must’ to go
It's very special restaurant. Amazing atmosphere. Very good food. I loved the stake... Big.. Weldone... Tasty.. Very good music live band. Will visit again.
The place is real fun. Nice music and always great ambiance. However I find the food is not equivalent to what you pay for it. Too expensive.
A three hour wait without an explanation (when you have reservations) is not reasonable. Horrible service. Won’t go back or recommend to friends.
The place is a unique experience. Excellent food and very friendly service. It would be good to improve the space for children
This place is amazing for a night out and the food is really good too. Not for the faint of heart since it can get really noisy.
Great atmosphere, great cocktails, nice staff, decent food. Overall good value, huge menu with lots of options from bites with a drink to full meals. Buzzing place!

Very nice Colombian food. The restaurant scene is fantastic. The food is great as well!! Staff well trained! Could English spoken staff as my friend from Indian could not understand the staff. Translation was necessary.
Now I understand why ia so famous, the place is huge!! And everything you get there is amaizing. The music is good the service is good and eaven there is crowded you have the chance to dance!!
Don‘t go there! Long waiting time. Bad service. Bad food. Very cold. Loud music. At least we were only waiting 45 minutes for our table which was free the whole time we were waiting...
I’ve been here a couple of times, and it’s getting better. Food is delicious, excellent service. Nice experience. Don’t miss it.
OMG! This is something to experiment if you are in bogota! Visited both of them at Bogota DC and at Chia

The restaurant is big, busy and noisy. Food is good. The prices are rather more expensive in comparison to other restaurants, but it feels that it worse it. It’s nice to come as a group to have fun, not for business talks...
All that you read is true about place and food is true. Never been to a restaurant like this as the variety of food is extensive, wood fire cooking delicious and service was quick and excellent!
Nice place to party. Food is good but is not of other world. Staff is very regular. But what can i say they’re all childrens

Far awAy from the center of Bogota is this interesting restaurant that turns into a dance party after dinner. It’ll be an experience you’ll never forget. The menu is complex and looks like a comic book but food is good and drinks are fun!
A great restaurant, great service and great food. The place is so unique decorated, that you will be amaze! Will highly recommend!

Titulo: Excellent Food Paired with Great Entertainment Value
Reviews: I had visited the restaurant several times during my frequent business trips to Bogota. Each time I had a good experience. The multi-level restaurant is fun! The dancing with the locals was especially enjoyable.
Massive facility, very expensive for average foid quality. The night life is the good part of it, it gets packed with foteigns and locals. All type of music

Great place for parties.. not so good for its service! They serve the food at different time.. so if you want to have fried Yucas with guacamole, forget it.. food is ok, , price to high for its quality and service

Rumba and good food with lots of entertainment. This is a huge place, always very busy with local food of great quality. But rumba all the time. If little old ladies want a quiet lunch this is not the place to go!

This place is awesome. The food, ambience, service is excellent. My friends and I had a blast. The waitres answered and explained all our questions and had a contagious happiness. This place is a must in Bogota!!
Increíble food, outstanding service and the party is simply out of this world. A place to come back again and again.
I felt good. Great atmosphere, live lovelly music, excelent foods and drinks, clean toilets, serveble and respectfull personell. I strongly recommend!

Enjoyed a great lunch at this crazy restaurant - 5 years later and it's still as good as ever. Food excellent, beers icy cold and great. Highly recommended - you can't visit Bogota and not visit this place :-)
Go to this place for: • Atmosphere • Decor • Food • Staff • Other clients • And the most important thing - Lomo El Trapo - the best in the world !!!
The restaurant is a perfect spot to pleased a customers. The ambience is a unique experience with a lot of artists, great music and superb food.

The choices of food and Cocktails were amazing. I will never forget this place it was delicious. I went to the one in Chia Colombia. I also attended the one in Bogota Colombia which was also equally as good but it did not have entertainment
Great ambiance great music ! Great food very Colombia atmosphere lots of dancing a must go when in bogota!

I am originally from Colombia and this is definitely my favorite restaurant every time I come to Bogota. The meat is amazing and the desserts as well. I recommend this restaurant specially if you are seeking some fun along with some amazing food.

This restaurant should definitely be one of the best rated in Bogotá. Combination of very friendly staff, music, live entertainment, ambient and delucious food, makes this place a must see in Bogotá. Strongly recommend.

Think about a very interesting bar ... everything mixed... Good music, good bar and good food. Happy people and crowded. Lots os locals mixed with tourists. Funny and light it is a very good place to have a night out !

I visited the Andres Carne de Res at the Shopping Santa Barbara. The food was good. Ordered a Lomito( beef) with arepas and yuca frita. It was good. Also chimichurri was good. The menu and food options are confusing but food is good
Nice music, all music and topical music, the service are very good, topical drinks and a lot beers local and imported. Different floor with different themes and names.
Such an interesting place! The staff was very kind, good food and music! It is a must go place! Great attention!!!
I came here for dinner by myself and must say this place is intense! A very large restaurant and bar with cool decorations and very nice staff.

Visited this place because every tourist website told us to go there. The place was nice and the food was good. But maybe it was too touristy for me. I doubt if any locals eat here. Crowd was mostly foreigners, if not all.
I'm not sure why this place is popular, it expensive with bad customer service. The food is average at best and the drinks are extortionate. Save your money and go somewhere else.

Titulo: Andrés Carne de res Hacienda Santa Barbara
Reviews: This restaurant is a mess! Very bad food quality, worse customer service and very expensive!! Don't waste your money!!

Titulo: Good place for a group event
Reviews: Very commercial. A lot going on. Food was acceptable. We were over 100 people. Service at tables ranged from good to awful. Worth it in a large group for the experience.

Titulo: Lunch while your kids are happy playing!
Reviews: With interesting ambience, eat good food while your kids are playing with dedicated staff. Worth mentioning that servings a relatively small, for example dish advertised for two are a bit short, good to keep you thin hahaha , enjoy !

Titulo: Good Vibes Makes Food taste Better!
Reviews: This is a restaurant that gives you a unique experience. Music, waitresses dancing, and the decoration of the place is trippy. Very good food, the menu is veryyyy extensive! Don’t miss the chicharrones, agiaco (soup), and the steaks are top quality!!

Went there at 8pm on a Thursday night. The place is huge and was really busy but the food was really good and the service was outstanding. Pretty rare for such a popular place to keep up with both of these...
Excelent food and music, that is if you like salsa, merengue and other Latin rithms. The place to dance, eat and drink Latin style.
Both starters and main dishes were tasty and well presented. Service was a bit patchy, with some of the staff being excellent and others being grumpy. Let’s see how the next visit will be.
Visited with friends on saturday night. Food was good. Meat was tender. Try the arepa de choclo. After dinner, club atmosphere was great!
My favorite meal in Columbia! Words can’t describe - a must experience in Bogota. We visited the original site in Chia
It’s rather pricey for what you get, but this restaurant is quite an experience! Definitely worth a visit.

Titulo: fun, but a long drive from Bogota
Reviews: It is a fun place. Good drinks, decent food. Touristy, but worth a visit. It depends where you stay in Bogota, but it could be an hour drive.
Excellent moment at Andrés nuevamente. Drinks , mojito large, beer local or glass of wine. Empanadas, filet of beef or local soup : great. Service is good, fast and fun. Go !
A million things to walk around and read before you even know what you can eat and every little things costs extra. Go to a real restaurant with table service and save some time and money.

Titulo: Yes worth it; anytime its Open!
Reviews: As awesome, cool and worth ehatever you get. There is a tine to go for all types. Enjoy!!! Awesome place!!!
Had a really good meal, cool environment and good service. Really cool decor, food was great had a tbone and deserts, all good.
Sure, every tourist goes here, but that's for a reason. Extremely fun place, decent food, wild atmosphere. You have to go.

Greatest "chorizo" ever!! Highly recommended, loved it, almost fat free - top! Great meat, great sharing dishes, "millions" of details you get lost in. Higly recommended place. Not cheap, but alright for european I suppose.

Andrés, as we call it in Colombia, is a truly unique place world wide where you can get a flavor of Colombian culinary delights, colombian culture, music and people. It is a destination in itself and not to be missed.
A must visit place , authentic Colombian food cooked with grandma’s recipes. Very lively ,excellent service, very friendly staff

We had read about this place and heard from friends that it was good, but that is an understatement. I have to say that Columbian food was good everywhere we ate. This food and service was exceptional.

This restaurant is located in a nice area in Bogotá, among lots of nice stores, within a fancy shopping mall. This is a very urban like look restaurant, with great food and exotic drinks. I highly recommend although it's a little bit pricey!
Feels a bit like Blade Runner in Bogotá. Four stories from hell to heaven (or the other way round). Quite an experience!
An institution in Bogota. Like a circus but with fantastic food. I had scampi and Chataubriand. The scampi was tasty, and the steak to die for. The entertainmant was fantastic too.

Place is full of Colombian unique decorations, you have never seen anything like it. High level of service, large option of menu good and drink items. High prices but you pay the experience. It is a must to visit while in Bogota.

Local food, crazy drinks and the most amazing hosts. This definitely isn’t a quiet restaurant, there’s always something happening in the next table or yours! Live music is also a regular and the food is really good.

Titulo: The best place for dinner in Bogota
Reviews: This was my second time there. Such an amazing experience! It is the best restaurant in Bogota for dinner with family, friends, partner, anything else. It is a life experience.
Crazy place! Huge - 4 stories, at least - each story crazier than the last. Music is loud in a total party atmosphere... food was ok, tho we found the beef a little tough. Go for the scene!
Ask for the mixed plate of meats, the patacones with guacamole, empanadas Cachacas, & the arepa de choclo. All to die for. The ambiance was great, we danced & had a lot of fun. Great service!
We arrived early as we did not make a reservation. All staff was very friendly. Great environment. Steak was cooked as ordered.

The place is incredible, an Ali Bsba cave. The food is pricy for Colombia but very good. The speciality Lomo al trapo was excellent. Service is also good. On a Saturday minors are not admitted after 5pm and can stay only until 8pm.

Titulo: One of the best restaurants in Bogota
Reviews: Fun atmosphere, great food, and incredible service. Rafael hooked me up with wine and food tasting menu that’s was incredible! Vibe is cool and everyone is either smiling or dancing!!

An excellent, fun and happy atmosphere with excellent food, drink and staff. Everyone was excellent - dancing was nearly mandatory and the Aguardiente (Colombian drink) shots were endless. A great place to go!!!
We are sitting here after waiting over an hour for food. Snobby staff. Tacky decor. A big tourist trap. Avoid at all costs unless you want to go to a Disneyland/Hard Rock Cafe in bogota.
Excelent crowd, local food and music, dance floor, but too expensive. Reservations are always needed.
This classic enclave with all it's decor is made to be enjoyed. Bring a crowd! It's a great time out of the city.

Titulo: Best place to visit in Bogota
Reviews: This is an obligated place to visit in Bogota. This is a place where you can find both good food and great party!!!
The food and the decoration is excellent. There is a wide variety of meat and also there is a performance stage and dance floor. A real latin american place for food and fun

Excellent food, fantastic juices.. vibrant, energetic, fast, hygienic! Plenty of options, live music, nice interior and great seating... be ready for hearing rapid-fire Spanish and mouth-watering aromas!
Had dinner here with a large group of friends. Super fun atmosphere, but unfortunately, the food was mediocre and nothing special.

Good food, good drinks, good music and good vibe. Went with collegues we all got drunk with tequila and aguardiente and had a great dinner and great night, tottaly recommend it. Prices are a little bit high but worth it.
Had a great time and the food was good. You have to experience this restaurant if you are visiting Bogota. Great music and loved the papa criollas.

Well I thought I will splash out on a big steak. Well I wasn't disappointed, super food. The atmosphere is loud which is not to my taste but if you go in a group it's perfect. I can recommend this joint
Great place to have fun, listen to live music, dance and try local food. Excellent interior decoration.

10 points to Andres - carne del res. No word to be added: many choices, great food, excellent atmosphere. If you’re in Bogotá, a visit here is a MUST. Don’t come here for typical Colombian food - come here for carne!
Really amazing colombian food, a great selection of dishes even if you are looking for something small. I would recommend trying their beers too!
Andres is a staple! If you are in Bogota you have to enjoy an afternoon or a crowded uber fun night there. Loved this place when i lived in bogota at 15 loved this place at my 39 birthday!

Titulo: Good Food in a fun setting
Reviews: I had visited the first restaurant 15 years ago. This one is more central and over kitch bit fun particularly if you have kids. I like BBQ food. We had a good time.
This is a very unique restaurant / night club. It is a must see when you are in Bogota but hard to describe. Just go for the experience. The food was very good.
For sure the best in town! Great costumes, excellent service and the Mandarino is the best cocktail ever!

Just loved!!! It’s like they say: bueno, bonito y carito! Amazing!! MUST GO! Must walk all the restaurant up and down many times to check it all, there are much to see (teu to get a table at the INFIERNO level)

Great place to visit with a group of friends. Plenty food to choose from as well as drinks! The service was great and there was a music group playing around. Note: it can get a bit loud so consider that.
Excellent place to go with friends to have fun and eat, the local music is very cheerful, good liquor and a variety of food dishes to choose from.
We visited this restaurant on our last night in bogota. A lively venue with loads of atmosphere. It can be loud, but would be a lot of fun with a group of friends.
This place never disappoints. Fun restaurant with great food. This is a party place perfect for celebrations. Reservations recommended.
Food was great, although slightly pricey. The atmosphere was great with lots of live performances. Service was excellent!

Little hidden place in the middle of small shopping. Very decorated, crowded and noisy. Lot of friendly staff, quick service. Average meat, got some fruits for the journey home. Maybe good for parties, but definitely not for private or business meal.
A must go place for a good taste of food and latin culture. It is crowded and noisy, creasy but fun. Don’t plan for a talk but to move your body, otherwise sit and watch.
Looking for a whacky environment, good food and meticulous service? Look no further; this is the place. Enjoy!

Titulo: Great atmosphere, must do place in Bogota
Reviews: Recommend the food, drinks, music, dance, all on affordable prices. If you want to have dinner book a table in advance.
what can i say , gorgeous people , great food , strong drinks, 3 dance floors, awesome music, this place is perfect!
A mandatory stop if you are in Bogota, period. Good food, good drinks, relaxed athmosphere and great service.

Titulo: Fun, fun fun. Plus excellent food and drink
Reviews: This is a fun filled restaurant. A must go to spot in Bogota. Be prepared to stay a while and enjoy yourself.

Titulo: Its a must... dont spec much on the food
Reviews: The place its amazing, so much decoration and very atractive... i really enjoyed the place the service and everything... but the food wasnt too great
This is a place you can't miss in Bogotá, the food the staff, the store, everything is unique. Recommend the meat...it gets really cool after 10pm.Decoracion is amazing!!!
Eclectic restaurant with big menu and interesting fare. I visited for lunch and ordered some lighter options with coffee and was not disappointed with service or food.
Known for it's meat and eclectic decor, was a dining experience you wouldn't want ro rush through! Didn't have meat but excellent pasta and Troutd

Good food, eclectic decor with tremendous night life. But there are some extensions elsewhere. The ine and only is in Chía in outskirts of Bogotá. So make sure that is the one you get to. You'll love it.

Probably one of the most eccentric places I've ever visited, the food is great and the place is outstanding it has different themes in the different floors and a plus is that service is very friendly definitely a must !

Im a vegetarian and there were many options. I was not excited to come here because I don't eat meat. I was pleasantly surprised with the options. Mushrooms, potatoes , asparagus and lots more. And my husband loved his steak. Win Win!!
Great Food, unusual decor, and a great show to boot!!! It's a little far out of Bogota, with traffic it can be long to reach, but it's worth the trip.

This is possible one of the most well known restaurants im bogota, although it's not actually in bogota, it's located in chia a 45mins drive depending on traffic from bogota. Amazing food, crazy decor and the best atmosphere you really cannot miss this one out.

My second time at Andres after 10 years. My memory serve me right and the place was as good as I remembered. Food was high quality and drinks on the expensive side. Had a superb time dancing latino and international hits!

Titulo: Crowded over priced terrible service and worse food!
Reviews: Atmosphere is like a circus gone rogue, it was crowded, loud, really loud, had to wait 1.5 hours for a small table, service terrible, food even worse. You can find such better places near this place, and for your own sake find one!

an original restaurant located close to bogota city, the food is amazing ,delicious, you can enjoy music. enterteiment clawons, dancers, jokers... the architecture is original, many creative devices... i really love that place

Andres Carne de Res is a big restaurant in Bogotá, Colombia. The food is great, the price is good and the service is very good too. Despite of its size (it is a huge place), it is highly recommended to make a reservation.

Titulo: Best restaurant i've ever seen so far !
Reviews: Very nice concept with great service and the food is just pure quality. Props to the chef and all staff members ! Great visit !

Titulo: Nice Funny and Very good meat
Reviews: Very Nice restaurant with salsa dancing good méat carne lot of colombian people a fashion place not si expansive

Titulo: Totally Wacky Restaurant - a must do!!
Reviews: This restaurant is an interesting experience, a must do, it is incredible the food is fabulous, the waiters are exceptional, the ambience is incredible, what an experience loved it - totally eccentric and brilliant!! You must go if in the area!

We checked out this place on a friend's recommendation. Such a trip! We didn't have a reservation, but we were able to get a drink at the bar. All the staff were friendly. Worth a trip to check out the decor.

One of the stop you cannot missed in Bogotá! Expectacular place with a lot of things that you never seen before! Good live show, great food, great ambient! Also get a souvenir from their shop! Great service! Great experience!

Titulo: If you go to this restaurant in Colombia, must be this location!
Reviews: Great place, incredible food, I really would like to go back to try so many Colombian food...the menu is a book! everything very nice prepared!

I had one of my experience to remember in this place. This place has so much energy, you would not believe it before you have been here. The music, the staff, the food, the guests. Everybody was happy having a great time.
A must visit party spot in Bogota. The food is really good. You can't go wrong with any of the options from the very extensive menu.

It's very unique place good for lunch dinner drink party and it's so crowded on the weekend because it's the best night club in the city and the food is so so delicious and you will meet people from all over the world there
What an experience! I've now visited twice, and it's definitely worth the long drive to Chia. Such great food and a really interesting atmosphere. Unforgettable experience.
Great tourist must do. A little expensive for Bogota but worth it Ok food good floor show but should book first as very busy.
I had multiple people telling me I had to go here. Went with some locals what an amazing experience. I wouldn't consider a trip to bogota complete without going here.
If you have the opportunity to travel to Bogotá, this is must. Amazing place to eat and enjoy all the night.
Really, really fun spot to get a great local flavor. Menu is huge, great bar like atmoshere with a ton going on.
As always the best place in Colombia to party, eat and have the greatest of experiences. Cant leave without trying the " mandarino" and arepa de choclo. Fully recommended, do not miss!
A realy big complex in the heart of the party zone of Bogota. Restaurant, bar, club - in the same place.
Really cool place. Marci-gras-ish. Good food too! Bring bug repellant if you're going to the outdoor festival you'll need a blanket to sit on if you don't get there in time to get a seat.
They experience at this restaurant is very unique the music was so fun and the food was delicious. The service was excellent and the price was right. I will love to return soon

A classic that you cannot miss if you come to Bogota. Superb food and drinks in a magic realism environment. You will finish with a table top dancing after a very enjoyable night. The crew is very supportive and friendly.
One of the most famous restaurants in Bogotá, good food! The place is great, full of interesting things from Colombia. This place is a "must" of Bogotá.
It a places for both local and tourist food is a 3 but the bar scene is fun and the music allows you to enjoy the place safe , clean a lot of security
Cool place to go out and have dinner and try colombian traditional dishes! Great music and good atmosphere to dance!

Titulo: Fun place, awesome experience, don't miss it
Reviews: Amazing vibe, happy place, good music, great food and drinks with fine service, dancing starts from the upper floor, unique decoration, overall experience is just awesome.

Everyone coming to Bogota should visit Andres D.C. restaurant. Decoration of restaurant is quite different, and food is delicious. Waiters are helpful and most of them speak English, which is hard to find in Bogota

I basically tried 10 dishes and I was blown away by the new flavors. It waa business dinner, then not to much party although on the upper floor there were a few people dancing. You cannot miss this out.

If you are in Bogota you must go there. You can go either to have dinner with your family or with your friend and then stay to dance. Is really different and you have to try it. The food was also excellent

there is not enough words to describe how amazing is this place, If you come from overseas you gotta go there. the whole experience, the place by itself, the food, the service and the party make it perfect and worthy!

An amazing tipe of restaurant, food was wow, excellent environment , besides that good food you can also dance salsa. Just in the middle of wherever you're setting down. This restaurant is so amazing. I enjoyed everything there. I recommend very much.
You'll always have fun, find good meats, good drinks, the best environment in town from Monday to Sunday is always good to go. If you want to party choose weekends.
Beautiful decor and excellent ambiance with live music on a Sunday lunch time. Plenty of food choices. Amazing ethnic cuisine.
I have visited Andres twice. it is a great place for eating. plates are very good and tastes amazing. drinks are a little expensive but are also good. music is great and we had a lot of fun.
Pretty good food, great service, decoration is insane! We thought it would be way to touristic or childish but it's not. Definitely a must do in Bogota.

Titulo: One Of The Best Dining Experiences EVER
Reviews: Everything, service, atmosphere, food, were all amazing. One of the best dining experiences ever, and one of the best experiences overall while in Bogota.

Titulo: This is the place for beef lovers
Reviews: If you are looking for a nice thick juicy piece of steak, look no further. This restaurant sell nice quality meat cooked just right, and of course there is much more than just steaks.

Titulo: A Must Go TOP 3 RUMBA Places
Reviews: Awesome place to hang out, dance, food & drinks great place...magical party style! Food is great, breakfast....lunch, One Of A Kind Place!

Titulo: Unique combination of restaurant and theatre! Great food!
Reviews: I visited this place woith our Colombian friend and it was absolutely awesome experience. The food was delicious, interior very original and the show around makes the atmosphere unique. Haven't seen this anywhere else yet. Combination of restaurant and theatre. 10 out 10!!!

Titulo: Overpriced and sort of a tourist trap. But great and fun place
Reviews: It's a quite expensive venue and the food is nothing especial. Thus, if your sole purpose is eating, I don't recommend. I rather recommend Andres DC if you're there for nightlife as the place it's quite fun and good for that.
We recently had the pleasure of dining at the Andres DC restaurant and loved it. The food was very good, service acceptable and atmosphere fun-filled.
Good restaurant, nice entertainment during diner, lovely music and above all good Columbian food... next time I would love to go again...
This is the best !! The food they tray the costumer very special the prices are right I really recommend
Top example of Vattitude. Great food, great place, great vibes. Possibly one of the top 3 places i've been in my life with most #Vattitude.
